title: Shoulder wrap blanket (Phaa tuum)
text: The <I>phaa tuum<I> is a light weight blanket that can be wrapped around the shoulders at night to provide extra warmth, but is also used as a travelling blanket or as a baby blanket.
description: two panels, indigo and natural, joined at selvedges; different but similar diagonal geometric patterns; 8\" silk woven border at one end has narrow geometric rows of supplementary weft in red, purple, teal and orange; red silk warp continues into indigo panels, then changes
creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
